HHS on GitHub
About Issues

US Department of
Health and Human Services (HHS)

This site is a landing page to direct visitors to HHS-related GitHub accounts, repositories and pages that are maintained under various names by HHS operating divisions, staff offices and programs.

HHS, as an umbrella organization, has its own GitHub organizational account that hosts repos, and this GitHub.io page.

HHS-related GitHub Accounts HHS-related GitHub Repositories HHS-related Developer Starter Tool Kit

HHS-related GitHub Accounts

Blue Button ONC
Centers for Medicare & Medicaid Services CMS
Dept of Health & Human Services HHS
Food & Drug Administration FDA
HHS IDEA Lab IDEALab
National Cancer Informatics Program NIH
National Center for Biotechnology Information (NCBI) NIH
Public Health Informatics Lab CDC

HHS-related GitHub Repositories

CKANext data.json Custom CKAN extension for the HHS 'dataset' catalog
Healthcare Fraud Prevention Partnership Application that supports a data exchange network for preventing and detecting fraud, waste and abuse across health insurance payers.
hhs.github.io Jekyll code that runs this website.
Medicaid Provider Enrollment Screener Efficient multi-state, multi-program provider screening application capable of risk scoring, credentialing validation, identify authentication, and sanction checks.
Pillbox for Developers Code that cleans up, or processes, source data for prescription, over-the-counter, homeopathic and veterinary oral solid dosage medications (pills) marketed in the United States. Produces an easy-to-use, "pill-focused" dataset.
Voice of Consumer (VOC) The Voice of Consumer (VOC) tool is a key component of the HHS website performance measurement framework.
